# tf.keras.backend.epsilon


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/epsilon">

<td>

Returns the value of the fuzz factor used in numeric expressions.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/epsilon"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.backend.epsilon</code></a>
* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/backend/epsilon"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.backend.epsilon</code></a>


``` python
tf.keras.backend.epsilon()
```



<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


#### Returns:

A float.



#### Example:


```python
keras.backend.epsilon() >>>1e-07
```
